General.Name: Choppies Enterprises Ltd
General.Description: Choppies Enterprises Limited operates a chain of supermarkets in Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Namibia, and internationally. The company's stores offer fresh fruit and vegetables, bakery, groceries, butchery, and takeaways. It also provides value added/financial services comprising mobile money, airtime, utilities payment, bus tickets, foreign exchange, and satellite tv subscription. The company operates 8 hyper stores, 135 superstores, and 18 value stores under the Choppies brand. Choppies Enterprises Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Gaborone, Botswana.
General.Address: Gaborone International Commercial Park, Gaborone, Botswana
